channel.title: Comments on: SSMS – Enabling Ctrl+R Shortcut to show or hide query results/messages pane
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Toby Ovod-Everett
item.dc:creator: Toby Ovod-Everett
item.description: You can also reset the keyboard shortcuts to the SSMS configuration, and that will catch other keyboard shortcuts. Select "(Default)" for "Apply the following additional keyboard mapping scheme" and then click "Reset" to the right.
item.content:encoded: You can also reset the keyboard shortcuts to the SSMS configuration, and that will catch other keyboard shortcuts. Select “(Default)” for “Apply the following additional keyboard mapping scheme” and then click “Reset” to the right.

item.title: By: V Komati
item.dc:creator: V Komati
item.description: Thank you Very much. The solution worked successfully
item.content:encoded: Thank you Very much. The solution worked successfully
